title: What technology is used in selective breeding? - Quora

response.answer_text: You allow the members of a population with characteristics you find desirable to breed and don’t breed those who don’t have the characteristics you want or have characteristics you find undesirable. That’s it really, you do that with every generation. It works just like evolution by natural selection, except you are applying a very strong selection pressure in the direction you desire.
You have two people that want to marry you and have kids with you. When you choose just one of them, you’re practicing selective breeding.
